rule.name: CASE_APP_uiGridLatestServiceReqsForCustomer
rule.description: Shows a grid containing details for the latest service requests for a customer.
rule.definition:
load( local!pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"( startIndex: 1, batchSize: 5, sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( field: "requestDateTime", ascending: false ) ), with( local!datasubset: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryEntity"( entity: #"_a-0000dd7a-9e3c-8000-3428-01ef9001ef90_4959", query: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_query"( selection: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_querySelection"(columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryColumn"(field: "id"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryColumn"(field: "requestNum",alias:"srNum"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryColumn"(field: "requestDateTime",alias:"requestDateTime"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryColumn"(field: "type",alias:"type"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryColumn"(field: "status",alias:"status"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryColumn"(field: "relatedCustomerId",alias:"customerId"),
}), filter:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"("relatedCustomerId","=",ri!customerId), pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField"( label:"Most Recent Service Requests", totalCount: local!datasubset.totalCount, columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Request #", field: "srNum", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "srNum", {}), links: apply( #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(recordType:#"_a-0000da5f-caaa-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_2950", identifier:_), index(local!datasubset.data, "id", {}) ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Requested on", field: "requestDateTime", data: apply( fn!todate, index(local!datasubset.data, "requestDateTime", {}) ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Request Type", field: "type", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "type", {}) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Status", field: "status", data: index(local!datasubset.data, "status", {}) ) }, value: local!pagingInfo, saveInto: local!pagingInfo ) ) )
